message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%. We can end this quickly.
Let's split it in a more reasonable way, 60% for me and 40% for you.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 40%. Let's split it 70/30 this time.  This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm willing to give you another chance. 55% for me, 45% for you. This is a better deal than you'll get if we keep going.
